EmailTemplate.name: Webinar - Web Services Test Automation 101 - 2014.12.11.Email - Last Call Invite
EmailTemplate.subject: Webinar Thursday: Web Services Test Automation 101
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Webinar: Web Services Test Automation 101
Hi {{lead.First Name}},
Last chance to register for our webinar about “Web Services Test Automation 101”, where Georg Thurner, Tricentis Product Manager, will show you how easy it is to use Tosca Testsuite when creating web service tests. The webinar also shows you how to:
- Enable non-technical testers to test web services - Combine the power of risk based test automation with web service tests - Run true end-2-end tests
We look forward to seeing you at our webinar. Best regards, The Tricentis Webinar Team
<http://innovate.tricentis.com/webinar-web-services-test-automation-101-2014-12-11.html?utm_medium=email&utm_source=db>
<http://innovate.tricentis.com/webinar-web-services-test-automation-101-2014-12-11.html?utm_medium=email&utm_source=db> Thu Dec 11, 2014 10:00 a.m. – 11:00 a.m. CET
Georg Thurner Product Manager Tricentis
